summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Skinn Cosmetics Lip 6X Balm (Strawberry Daiquiri) Review Date: 2016/12/10 Store: Skinn Cosmetics Average Rating: 4.1 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Skinn Cosmetics', 'Item Form': 'Balm', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Flavor': 'Strawberry Daiquiri', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '6.3 x 2.7 x 0.7 inches; 0.35 Ounces', 'UPC': '729440770884'} Review Text: I like this stuff! It feels good on my lips. Gives a nice tint, too. Review Title: Recommend Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Mane-ly Long Hair Detangler/Polisher 8oz. Review Date: 2018/01/29 Store: Mane-ly Long Hair Product Description: ['MLH Denatngle/Polisher'] Average Rating: 4.7 Product Details: {'Product Benefits': 'Use on a Dirty/Dry or Clean/Wet Mane, Tail, Feathers & Forelock', 'Hair Type': 'All', 'Material Type Free': 'Alcohol Free', 'Liquid Volume': '8 Fluid Ounces', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '6.6 x 1.9 x 1.7 inches; 8 Ounces', 'UPC': '608729173847', 'Manufacturer': 'TTL', 'Country of Origin': 'USA'} Review Text: Used it in my golden retriever. Too oily.
Normally use coconut and it’s good for her (healthy) skin and enjoys it. Review Title: For my golden I’d not re-order. Rating: 2.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Lucky Teeth Organic Toothpaste-All Natural, Remineralizes and Fortifies Teeth and Gums. (2 oz 1 Pack) Review Date: 2018/04/25 Store: Lucky Teeth Average Rating: 4.1 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Lucky Teeth', 'Flavor': 'Cinnamon', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Item Form': 'Paste', 'Material Type Free': 'Fluoride Free, Gluten Free, Glycerin Free', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '2.75 x 1.5 x 2.75 inches; 2.56 Ounces', 'UPC': '636160246936', 'Manufacturer': 'Lucky Teeth'} Review Text: This toothpaste is good. That said, I got what I paid for here. It’s not anything earth shattering, it won’t make your teeth any cleaner than another toothpaste, help your gums heal, etc. but it IS a healthier choice! For that I give it 4 thoughtful stars. Tastes good as well. Review Title: Tastes good Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Michel Design Works Oversized Triple Milled Bath Soap Bar, Avocado, Large, 8.7 Ounce Review Date: 2018/08/18 Store: Michel Design Works Product Description: ['This substantial 8.7-ounce bath bar contains only the finest ingredients - pure vegetable palm oil, glycerin, and rich, moisturizing shea butter. Handmade in Sussex, England, these bars are triple-milled to produce a completely uniform, long-lasting soap. Imbued with carefully chosen Michel Design Works fragrances, every bath will be a luxurious one. Michel Design Works was created by Bruce & Deborah Michel in the early 1980s. The first product was an elaborate “memory book” called Our Country Diary. Still a favorite today, it is filled with vintage artwork, quirky quotes, notable dates and plenty of room to record all the events of the year. Our Country Diary will become a beautiful record of your family life. When they first created their signature elephant logo, it signified a remembrance of all things special. Although Michel Design Works has greatly expanded into bath & body, home fragrance and decor, when Bruce & Deborah remember and celebrate all of their wonderful customers and the company’s history, it is even more fitting today! Whether you are a new or a long-time friend, we welcome you to enjoy the art, lather up with our English soaps, set an elegant table with napkins, candles, plates, and serveware, and end your day with wonderfully fragrant n bubble bath.'] Average Rating: 4.6 Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Bar', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Brand': 'Michel Design Works', 'Scent': 'Avocado', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '5 x 3 x 3 inches; 8.8 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'SOAL259', 'UPC': '608666698793', 'Manufacturer': 'Michel Design Works'} Review Text: I like big bars and I cannot lie.
This is rich, luxurious and long lasting.
It makes my skin smell good, feel good and as a bonus the whole bathroom smells good! Review Title: Great BIG bar! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Michel Design Works Large Bath Soap Bar - Flamingo Review Date: 2019/08/27 Store: Michel Design Works Average Rating: 4.9 Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Bar', 'Brand': 'Michel Design Works', 'Scent': 'Orange', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '5 x 3 x 2.1 inches; 9.6 Ounces', 'UPC': '608666722917'} Review Text: What I love (and ALL the bar soaps I’ve ever purchased from this vendor has been wonderful) :
Oversized! It lasts a really LONG time ...no little slivers..it’s a great value!
Smells entirely wonderful...the scent wafts out of the bathroom ...into the hallway and makes the air I breath so beautiful (for both my husband AND myself). Makes for a good nights sleep.
Comes well packaged. Not shrink wrapped & difficult to access. The scent is nice so I like to stock up and have a drawer of them to scent our bathrooms until used.
I don’t know how they do this quality at this price...but it’s the best soap at the best price. Go get some, you’ll be happy too. Review Title: These seem to just be the best bar soaps 🧼 on the market today Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Michel Design Works Triple Milled Shea Butter Bath Soap Bar, Tranquility Review Date: 2019/09/24 Store: Michel Design Works Average Rating: 5.0 Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Bar', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Brand': 'Michel Design Works', 'Scent': 'Amber, Peach', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '4.69 x 2.4 x 2.01 inches; 9.6 Ounces', 'UPC': '608666716718', 'Manufacturer': 'Michel Design'} Review Text: Very nice (for us). The scent wafts out of the bathroom, into the bedroom and the hall. So we really enjoy the ritual of the scent. Thank you. Review Title: Big bar, well made, last’s long smells divine Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------

Do not repeat specific product names or details. It feels good on my lips. Gives a nice tint, too. Review Title: Recommend Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Mane-ly Long Hair Detangler/Polisher 8oz. Review Date: 2018/01/29 Store: Mane-ly Long Hair Product Description: ['MLH Denatngle/Polisher'] Average Rating: 4.7 Product Details: {'Product Benefits': 'Use on a Dirty/Dry or Clean/Wet Mane, Tail, Feathers & Forelock', 'Hair Type': 'All', 'Material Type Free': 'Alcohol Free', 'Liquid Volume': '8 Fluid Ounces', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '6.6 x 1.9 x 1.7 inches; 8 Ounces', 'UPC': '608729173847', 'Manufacturer': 'TTL', 'Country of Origin': 'USA'} Review Text: Used it in my golden retriever. Too oily.
Normally use coconut and it’s good for her (healthy) skin and enjoys it. Review Title: For my golden I’d not re-order. Rating: 2.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Lucky Teeth Organic Toothpaste-All Natural, Remineralizes and Fortifies Teeth and Gums. (2 oz 1 Pack) Review Date: 2018/04/25 Store: Lucky Teeth Average Rating: 4.1 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Lucky Teeth', 'Flavor': 'Cinnamon', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Item Form': 'Paste', 'Material Type Free': 'Fluoride Free, Gluten Free, Glycerin Free', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '2.75 x 1.5 x 2.75 inches; 2.56 Ounces', 'UPC': '636160246936', 'Manufacturer': 'Lucky Teeth'} Review Text: This toothpaste is good. That said, I got what I paid for here. It’s not anything earth shattering, it won’t make your teeth any cleaner than another toothpaste, help your gums heal, etc. but it IS a healthier choice! For that I give it 4 thoughtful stars. Tastes good as well. Review Title: Tastes good Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Michel Design Works Oversized Triple Milled Bath Soap Bar, Avocado, Large, 8.7 Ounce Review Date: 2018/08/18 Store: Michel Design Works Product Description: ['This substantial 8.7-ounce bath bar contains only the finest ingredients - pure vegetable palm oil, glycerin, and rich, moisturizing shea butter. Handmade in Sussex, England, these bars are triple-milled to produce a completely uniform, long-lasting soap. Imbued with carefully chosen Michel Design Works fragrances, every bath will be a luxurious one. Michel Design Works was created by Bruce & Deborah Michel in the early 1980s. The first product was an elaborate “memory book” called Our Country Diary. Still a favorite today, it is filled with vintage artwork, quirky quotes, notable dates and plenty of room to record all the events of the year. Our Country Diary will become a beautiful record of your family life. When they first created their signature elephant logo, it signified a remembrance of all things special. Although Michel Design Works has greatly expanded into bath & body, home fragrance and decor, when Bruce & Deborah remember and celebrate all of their wonderful customers and the company’s history, it is even more fitting today! Whether you are a new or a long-time friend, we welcome you to enjoy the art, lather up with our English soaps, set an elegant table with napkins, candles, plates, and serveware, and end your day with wonderfully fragrant n bubble bath.'] Average Rating: 4.6 Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Bar', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Brand': 'Michel Design Works', 'Scent': 'Avocado', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '5 x 3 x 3 inches; 8.8 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'SOAL259', 'UPC': '608666698793', 'Manufacturer': 'Michel Design Works'} Review Text: I like big bars and I cannot lie.
This is rich, luxurious and long lasting.
It makes my skin smell good, feel good and as a bonus the whole bathroom smells good! Review Title: Great BIG bar! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Michel Design Works Large Bath Soap Bar - Flamingo Review Date: 2019/08/27 Store: Michel Design Works Average Rating: 4.9 Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Bar', 'Brand': 'Michel Design Works', 'Scent': 'Orange', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '5 x 3 x 2.1 inches; 9.6 Ounces', 'UPC': '608666722917'} Review Text: What I love (and ALL the bar soaps I’ve ever purchased from this vendor has been wonderful) :
Oversized! It lasts a really LONG time ...no little slivers..it’s a great value!
Smells entirely wonderful...the scent wafts out of the bathroom ...into the hallway and makes the air I breath so beautiful (for both my husband AND myself). Makes for a good nights sleep.
Comes well packaged. Not shrink wrapped & difficult to access. The scent is nice so I like to stock up and have a drawer of them to scent our bathrooms until used.
I don’t know how they do this quality at this price...but it’s the best soap at the best price. Go get some, you’ll be happy too. Review Title: These seem to just be the best bar soaps 🧼 on the market today Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Michel Design Works Triple Milled Shea Butter Bath Soap Bar, Tranquility Review Date: 2019/09/24 Store: Michel Design Works Average Rating: 5.0 Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Bar', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Brand': 'Michel Design Works', 'Scent': 'Amber, Peach', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '4.69 x 2.4 x 2.01 inches; 9.6 Ounces', 'UPC': '608666716718', 'Manufacturer': 'Michel Design'} Review Text: Very nice (for us). The scent wafts out of the bathroom, into the bedroom and the hall. So we really enjoy the ritual of the scent. Thank you. Review Title: Big bar, well made, last’s long smells divine Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------
raw_response:
**Preferences and Patterns:**

1. **Personal Care Focus**: The purchaser shows a consistent interest in beauty and personal care products, particularly related to lip care, hair care, and body care.

2. **Preference for Quality**: High ratings suggest a preference for quality products. The individual favors items that provide a luxurious experience, as seen in purchases of oversized, moisturizing soaps.

3. **Natural and Health-Conscious Choices**: They are inclined toward natural and healthier alternatives in personal care, reflected in the purchase of organic toothpaste and natural ingredients in cosmetics.

4. **Scent-Oriented Products**: There is a strong appreciation for fragrant products, particularly luxurious scents in body care products that enhance the bathroom atmosphere and personal enjoyment.

5. **Consistency with Brands**: Repeated purchases from specific brands like Michel Design Works indicate brand loyalty, especially for products that meet their quality and scent preferences.

6. **Mixed Experience with Pet Products**: While they show interest in pet care products, their feedback suggests they are selective, preferring effective and non-oily solutions for their pet’s needs.

7. **Value for Size and Longevity**: The preference for sizable products that offer long-lasting use signifies a desire for good value in their purchases. 

Overall, the shopper enjoys quality, natural ingredients, appealing scents, and visually pleasing products that enhance their daily routine.

target_interaction.title: Good
target_interaction.title_meta: Dr.'s Remedy Enriched Nail Polish, Resilient Rose, 0.5 Fluid Ounce
features: Nail Polish Made With Organic And All Natural Ingredients - Repairs And Strengthens Nails
Doctor Recommended. Cruelty Free And Vegan Friendly - Made In the USA
Contains Natrual Actives Such As Biotin, Tea-Tree Oil, Garlic Bulb Extract, Lavender, Wheat Protein And Vitamins
Quick Dry, Brilliant Shine, Long Wear, Prevents Breakage, Hydrates Nails
Dr. Recommended - Non Toxic - For Best Results: Wear With Basic Base Coat And Calming Clear Top Coat.
description: Available in a kaleidoscope of over 40 vibrant shades and enriched with nourishing natural actives like , tea-tree oil, garlic bulb extract, lavender, wheat protein and , Dr.’s Remedy combines the best of beauty and science to create a non-toxic collection of polishes that are as gentle on nails as they are on the world around us.

videos.title: Dr.'s Remedy featured on The Rachael Ray Show

details.Special Feature: Not Tested On Animals, Organic, Natural Ingredients, Formaldehyde-Free
